definition: to carve/carved words/to agree/a contract/a deed
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
tacit understanding/mutual understanding/rapport/connected at a deep level with each other/(of team members) well coordinated/tight
agreement/to agree/to get on with/congenial/agreeing with/to ally oneself with sb
Sochi (city on the Black Sea in Russia)
Qidan or Khitan, ethnic group in ancient China, a branch of the Eastern Hu people inhabiting the valley of the Xar Murun River in the upper reaches of the Liao River 遼河|辽河[Liao2 He2]
Anton Pavlovich Chekhov (1860-1904), Russian writer famous for his short stories and plays
to get along well (with sb)/congenial/to speculate (on financial markets)
Cheka, a Soviet secret police agency, forerunner of the KGB

sentences.english: Mitch complimented Beth on her new shoes.
At many churches there are youth groups and youth activities.
sentences.chinese: 很多教會有青年團契和青年活動。

sentences.english: Fletcher turned to his instructor, and there was a moment of fright in his eye.
sentences.chinese: 弗萊契轉向他的導師，眼裏流露出喫驚的神情。

sentences.english: Old Grunch, the engineer, sat opposite him, and also wondered.
sentences.chinese: 坐他對面的工程師老葛朗契也感到奇怪。

sentences.english: Middlemarch is the greatest social and psychological novel ever written in English.
sentences.chinese: 《米德爾馬契》是迄今最偉大的英文社會心理學小說。

sentences.english: Sullivan Seagull laughed in spite of himself.
sentences.chinese: 不要怨恨他們，海鷗弗萊契。

sentences.english: Of course, none of those books was Middlemarch.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這些書中沒有《米德爾馬契》。

sentences.english: I was born in Burdine, Kentucky, in the heart of Appalachian coal-mining country.
sentences.chinese: 我出生於阿巴拉契山脈煤礦區中心的肯塔基州柏定市。

sentences.english: Where is the original feud of the Shang nationality whose ancestor established Shang Dynasty?
sentences.chinese: 曾經建立了商朝的商族，其始祖契的始封地究在何處？

sentences.english: Chekhov wrote, 'Only fools and charlatans know and understand everything.'
sentences.chinese: 契科夫寫到，只有愚者和吹噓者知道並理解一切事物。

sentences.english: 'Blatch, by all means. And let's say he was Thomas Williams's cellmate in Rhode Island.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，布拉契，就說他是湯米在羅德島監獄的牢友。

definition: (classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
to raise/to lift/to take along (e.g. one's family)
to close (a door)/to eclipse/muddled/stupid/ignorant/variant of 暗[an4]
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
soul/mortal soul, i.e. attached to the body
